title: Add edit transaction functionality
description:
## Summary
Add ability to edit transactions from expense/income cards and detail sheet.

## Context
- TransactionForm already supports edit mode via `transaction`/`income` props
- Server actions `updateExpense` and `updateIncome` already exist
- `getTransactionWithEntries(transactionId)` fetches transaction + entries

## Key Behavior
When editing expense with installments: ALL entries are deleted and regenerated, losing `paidAt` status.
**Decision**: Show warning dialog before editing multi-installment expenses.

## Implementation Steps

### 1. Create EditTransactionDialog component
New file: `components/edit-transaction-dialog.tsx`
- Handles fetching transaction with entries (for expenses)
- Renders TransactionForm in edit mode
- Shows warning for multi-installment expenses

### 2. Update ExpenseCard
- Add `accounts: Account[]` prop
- Add "Edit" menu item to dropdown
- Integrate EditTransactionDialog

### 3. Update IncomeCard
- Add `accounts: Account[]` prop
- Add "Edit" menu item to dropdown
- Integrate EditTransactionDialog

### 4. Update TransactionDetailSheet
- Add `accounts` and `categories` props
- Make Edit button functional
- Close sheet when opening edit dialog

### 5. Update parent pages
Pass accounts prop to cards in:
- `app/(app)/expenses/page.tsx`
- `app/(app)/income/page.tsx`

### 6. Add translations
Add keys to `messages/en.json` and `messages/pt-BR.json`:
- `expenses.editTransaction`
- `income.editTransaction`
- Warning dialog text for multi-installment edits

## Editable Fields
**Expenses**: description, amount, category, account, purchaseDate, installments
**Income**: description, amount, category, account, receivedDate

## Files to Modify
1. `components/edit-transaction-dialog.tsx` (new)
2. `components/expense-card.tsx`
3. `components/income-card.tsx`
4. `components/transaction-detail-sheet.tsx`
5. `app/(app)/expenses/page.tsx`
6. `app/(app)/income/page.tsx`
7. `messages/en.json`
8. `messages/pt-BR.json`

title: Security Hardening for Public Launch
description: Complete security audit and hardening before public launch with multi-user support. Addresses critical multi-tenancy vulnerabilities, authorization, rate limiting, and auth hardening.

title: Add userId to schema and migrate existing data
description: CRITICAL: Add userId column to all tables (accounts, categories, budgets, monthlyBudgets, transactions, income, faturas). Create Drizzle migration, write data migration SQL, and add RLS policies.

title: Implement authorization checks in all server actions
description: CRITICAL: Create lib/auth/get-current-user.ts helper. Update all server actions (accounts, categories, expenses, budgets, income, faturas, import) with userId filtering and ownership verification.

title: Add Upstash rate limiting to server actions
description: Install @upstash/ratelimit and @upstash/redis. Create rate limiter utility. Apply to auth actions and bulk operations.

title: Add security headers and strengthen auth
description: Add security headers to next.config.ts (CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options). Update supabase/config.toml for 8+ char passwords. Enable email confirmation. Add hCaptcha/Turnstile to login.

title: Harden input validation and cleanup secrets
description: Add validation to accounts.ts, income.ts, categories.ts. Add file upload validation (MIME type, size limits). Remove commented credentials from .env. Reduce error logging verbosity.
